1. Updated Changelog in app's venv
2. Update App Data in C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source\PyAniTools\app_data\{app name}\app_data.json to add latest version and desc from changelog
3. Update app pref in C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source\PyAniTools\installed\{app name}\app_pref.json to latest version
4. Make the new app exe and move to C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source\PyAniTools\installed\{app name}\{app name}.exe
5. Copy Core App Management exes:
	1. PyAniToolsSetup to C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source
	2. PyAniToolsUpdate to C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source\PyAniTools\installed
	3. PyAniToolsIUAssist to C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source\PyAniTools\installed
6. Update apps package in C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source\PyAniTools\packages\
7. Update anything in C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist\source\PyAniTools\install_scripts
	cgt - C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\PyAniToolsAppBridge\
	pyani - C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniLib\pyani
	menu.py
	init.py
	scandir
8. Update distribution package in C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist
9. Update last_update.json in C:\Users\Patrick\PycharmProjects\PyAniTools\Dist
